players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated him. Trust me."
Diana: "Let's gather more evidence before jumping to conclusions. Bob, can you explain how you investigated Charlie? I want to make sure we're all on the same page."
Charlie: "Bob, I think you're just trying to deflect attention from yourself. You were the one who was acting suspiciously last night."
You: "I have no reason to lie. I investigated Charlie and found evidence that he is the mafioso. If you don't believe me, you can investigate him yourselves."
